body: Set theory: ordinal analysis, admissible sets and Î±-recursion
Large cardinals: inner model theory and iterated forcing
Other math: descriptive set theory, non-generalized recursion theory and type theory
Low-level programming: operating systems, compilers and cybersecurity; C and Rust
Music: synthwave/chillwave (HOME, Chris Doerksen), psychedelic (Tame Impala), electro swing, jungle and phonk
We Know The Devil: a visual novel we highly commend
